verses.plain: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

tokens.t: And the
spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.plain: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

tokens.t: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering,
my bread for my sacrifices made by fire,
a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

verses.plain: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

tokens.t: And thou shalt say unto them, This
the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the
; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day,
a continual burnt offering.

verses.plain: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

tokens.t: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

verses.plain: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

tokens.t: And a tenth
of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth
of an hin of beaten oil.

verses.plain: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

tokens.t: a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the

verses.plain: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.

tokens.t: And the drink offering thereof
the fourth
of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy
shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the
a drink offering.

verses.plain: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.

tokens.t: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer
, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the

verses.plain: ¶ And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

tokens.t: ¶ And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour
a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

verses.plain: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

tokens.t: the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.plain: ¶ And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

tokens.t: ¶ And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the
; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

verses.plain: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

tokens.t: And three tenth deals of flour
a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour
a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

verses.plain: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

tokens.t: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil
a meat offering unto one lamb;
a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the

verses.plain: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

tokens.t: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third
of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth
of an hin unto a lamb: this
the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

verses.plain: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

tokens.t: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the
shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.plain: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.

tokens.t: And in the fourteenth day of the first month
the passover of the

verses.plain: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

tokens.t: And in the fifteenth day of this month
the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

verses.plain: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

tokens.t: In the first day
an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work

verses.plain: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

tokens.t: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire
a burnt offering unto the
; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

verses.plain: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

tokens.t: And their meat offering
flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

verses.plain: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

tokens.t: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

verses.plain: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

tokens.t: And one goat
a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

verses.plain: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

tokens.t: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which
for a continual burnt offering.

verses.plain: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

tokens.t: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the
: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

verses.plain: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

tokens.t: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

verses.plain: ¶ Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

tokens.t: ¶ Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the
, after your weeks
, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

verses.plain: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

tokens.t: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the
; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

verses.plain: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

tokens.t: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

verses.plain: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

tokens.t: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

verses.plain: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

verses.plain: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.

beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.

footnotes.text: a sweet…: Heb. a savour of my rest
day by day: Heb. in a day
at even: Heb. between the two evenings
